channel.title: iDigital
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from iDigital, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Buffett passes the torch — here’s what Berkshire loyalists should know, from a longtime insider
item.description: Buffett’s CEO successor Greg Abel may bring a change in style, greater collaboration.
